description:
Conan and the Detective Boys are attending author Omura Kosuke`s writing class. They were introduced to him by their acquaintance Tamaki Book Cafe employee Yoshikawa Michiko. The owner of the house where the class is behind held and Omura`s sponsor book collector Nojima Ryoji and his housekeeper Takeuchi Nagisa arrive. Nojima flies into a rage after reading Genta`s novel, and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 汽笛の聞こえる古書店3
